item.title: EP 140 - Is Bugs Bunny Really A Native American Deity?
item.itunes:title: Is Bugs Bunny Really A Native American Deity?
item.description:
Today we visit two ghosts in the barren deserts of Arizona and then we explore the bizarre theory that Bugs Bunny is really a Native American deity!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer
https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 
https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

The Colorado Fantasma and the Skeleton Of Borrego are two haunting specters that roam the deserts of Arizona. Is it possible that these creature still stalk the area today?

And then we look to the Conspiracy Iceberg to explore the terrifying reality that Bugs Bunny may be, not based on, but an actual incarnation of a trickster god.

Links:

Halloween Hike in the Haunted Superstitions & Lunch at Goldfield Ghost Town

https://www.meetup.com/Singlesingilbert/events/241370439/

Anza Borrego's Haunted Desert

https://www.desertusa.com/anza_borrego/haunted-desert.html

Fantasma Colorado

https://ufodigest.com/article/fantasma-colorado

Fantasma Colorado

http://obscurban-legend.wikia.com/wiki/Fantasma_Colorado

4Chan

https://archive.4plebs.org/x/thread/20062409/

MANABOZHO

http://www.godchecker.com/pantheon/native-american-mythology.php?deity=MANABOZHO

Legendary Native American Figures: Michabo (Michabou), the Great Hare

http://www.native-languages.org/michabo.htm

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
"As Above" Art By Grant Scott
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/deadrabbitradio/

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018
